BoxViewSuiteConfig.name: BoxViewSuiteConfig

BoxViewSuiteConfig.boxViewConfig.maxWidt.description:
If a pixels value is passed, boxview will force the box
to have at most this width.

BoxViewSuiteConfig.boxViewConfig.iconSiz.description: width and heigth of for the box icons, in its header part

BoxViewSuiteConfig.boxViewConfig.headerH.description: Box header's height when expanded, contains tools and title

BoxViewSuiteConfig.boxStrapperConfig.use.description:
Use the fancy startup screen while boxview and boxes are
loading?

BoxViewSuiteConfig.boxViewConfig.collaps.description: Do boxes spawn collapsed by default?

BoxViewSuiteConfig.boxViewConfig.animate.description: Use an animation when a box is resized

BoxViewSuiteConfig.boxViewConfig.type.description:
Default type for typeless boxes (every type is 
used as box css class in the HTML markup)

BoxViewSuiteConfig.boxViewConfig.resizem.description:
Enforces a maximum height for images and containers having 
the 'resizeme' css class

BoxViewSuiteConfig.boxViewConfig..description:
Alignment for the box icons. Possible values are "alignMiddle",
"alignTop" and "alignBottom"

BoxViewSuiteConfig.boxViewConfig.lazyRes.description:
Will check every lazyResizeInterval ms if boxview's container 
width/height are changed and resizes the boxview if needed

BoxViewSuiteConfig.boxViewConfig.collaps.description: Css class added to the box when collapsed

BoxViewSuiteConfig.boxViewConfig.anchorM.description:
Box fields to be saved into AnchorMan, encoding some in base64
If you need to use some strange character in your own fields (for example check AnchorManConfig separators!), prepend "encode" to your veryImportantField name, like: encodeveryImportantField: true.
By default qstring, title and verticalTitle are encoded before getting saved with anchorman

BoxViewSuiteConfig.boxViewConfig.description:
All of the following css classes will be used in the HTML markup.
For example when a box is collapsed collapsedClass will be added as css class to the box HTML markup, and removed when expanded. Changing the names here means that the page must provide a css stylesheet with the needed definitions, to style the elements accordingly. See the manual for more informations and examples.

BoxViewSuiteConfig.boxStrapperConfig.clo.description:
Closes automatically the loading dialog when BoxStrapper is
done

BoxViewSuiteConfig.boxViewConfig.animati.description:
Shortcut to set all of the animations at once, 
overrides any other given animate* parameter.

BoxViewSuiteConfig.boxStrapperConfig.ani.description: Animation lenght of the loading panel

BoxViewSuiteConfig.boxViewConfig.loading.description: Css class added while the box is loading

BoxViewSuiteConfig.boxViewConfig.collaps.description:
Box header's height when collapsed, usually 
contains tools like close/expand

BoxViewSuiteConfig.boxViewConfig.expande.description: Css class added to the box when expanded

BoxViewSuiteConfig.boxViewConfig.minWidt.description:
If a pixels value is passed, boxview will force the box
to have at least this width.

BoxViewSuiteConfig.boxViewConfig.vertica.description: Box title when it is vertical (collapsed)

BoxViewSuiteConfig.boxViewConfig.animate.description: Use an animation when a box is collapsed or expanded

BoxViewSuiteConfig.boxViewConfig.iconSlo.description: Horizontal margin for each icon slot in the box header

BoxViewSuiteConfig.boxViewConfig.iconsVe.description:
Top margin when the icons are displayed vertically, box
collapsed

BoxViewSuiteConfig.boxStrapperConfig.wai.description: Wait time before closing the loading dialog

BoxViewSuiteConfig.boxViewName.description:
Name of the BoxView object instance in the global
scope

BoxViewSuiteConfig.theme.description:
Theme to be applied to the boxview 
suite items. See the manual for more informations on how to roll 
your own theme.

BoxViewSuiteConfig.boxViewConfig.animate.description: Use an animation when a box is added

BoxViewSuiteConfig.boxViewContainer.description:
The container for the BoxView, a jQuery object like 
$('.someClass') or $('#someId')

BoxViewSuiteConfig.boxViewConfig.animate.description: Use an animation when a box is removed

BoxViewSuiteConfig.boxViewConfig.resizem.description:
Enforces a minimum height for images and containers having 
the 'resizeme' css class

BoxViewSuiteConfig.boxViewConfig.headerT.description:
left/right margin for the title of the box, inside 
its header part

BoxViewSuiteConfig.description:
Default configuration options for the boxview suite: boxview, widgets, anchorman, boxStrapper, boxToolbar, urlshortener and themes.

Each of these properties can be individually overridden in your local configuration file.

BoxView.description:
Default configuration options for the boxview suite: boxview, widgets, anchorman, boxStrapper, boxToolbar, urlshortener and themes.

Each of these properties can be individually overridden in your local configuration file.
BoxView.name: BoxView
